If you are in the market for a serious adventure double cab, this is it! With ultra low mileage, a one owner vehicle and premium accessories fitted all round this Hilux has everything you might need for your next adventure. a Full franchise service history sweetens the deal and gives the new owner complete peace of mind maintenance wise.

LED LIGHT BAR,LONG RANGE FUEL TANK,
WATER TANK,INVERTER,ROOF TOP TENT,SNORKEL,
OLD MAN EMU SUSPENSTION, ARB BASH PLATE AND NUDGE BAR, MELVILLE AND MOON SEAT COVERS, SUNROOF (FITTED BY TOYOTA),
ALU CANOPY WITH DRAWER SYSTEM,ROOF RACK, FULL TOYOTA SERVICE HISTORY, SPARE KEY, ONE OWNER, NO ACCIDENT HISTORY, DUAL BATTERY SYSTEM (National Luna) BRAND NEW DEEP CYCLE BATTERY AND MAIN BATTERY, 126000km,
